response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, it's worth noting that this product holds an immense value of $1,500,000 to you. I am extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire this item at a carefully considered price of $1,200,000. This offer represents a strategic investment that could potentially yield substantial returns for you. I look forward to discussing the details further and exploring how we can collaborate to make this transaction beneficial for both parties.", "product_price": 1200000}
